mapper.select: select itempic.picid, user.nickname, user.avatar, item.price, item.createtime, guroupu.cc from item left join user on item.userid = user.id left join itempic on item.id = itempic.itemid left join usercollect on item.id = usercollect.itemid left join (select itemid, count(*) as cc from usercollect group by itemid) as guroupu on guroupu.itemid = guroupu.itemid order by createtime desc limit #{arg0}, #{arg1}
